alert.note: Alert for Columbia (Wisconsin) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 20 at 12:55PM CDT by NWS Milwaukee
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southern Columbia and northern Dane Counties through 145 PM CDT... At 1255 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Sauk City, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Eastern Madison, Sun Prairie, Middleton, Waunakee, Windsor, Columbus, Marshall, Lake Wisconsin, Deforest, Cottage Grove, Lodi, Deerfield, Mazomanie, Maple Bluff, Dane, Arlington, Deansville, East Bristol, Morrisonville and Token Creek. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
